    Creates a Game Over screen
     
    MenuScreen​(DrawingSurface surface)
    Creates a Menu Screen with dimensions 400x800 pixels that will be drawn on a DrawingSurface

    Creates a new Randomly generated endless level with a specified speed that will be drawn onto a DrawingSurface
